transArray.content: I brought my friends here to stay in a room with very new facilities. I would like to praise the little girl at the front desk whose name I can’t remember. Her service attitude was very good and she gave me an extra breakfast. The new store has opened. If you are passing by nearby, you can come and stay here. It’s a good value for money. It’s Hanting. 3.5 product is really good and worth recommending!
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
